The Job Posting Title of the Job Requisition.

The number of positions made available by the job requisition.  This number can only be greater than 1 for job requisitions created with the "new position" option.  A value of greater than 1 was only allowed starting in W16.  This element must be omitted for the Create Job Requisition and Edit Job Requisition operations.
The number of openings or positions available to fill for the job requisition.
